name: Back Squat- 12 reps
Front Squat- 12 reps
Romanian Deadlift -15 reps
Reverse Lunge- 12 reps
excercise.description: Start off with your 10 min body stretch and warm up! Have a great Leg Day!

name: Incline push-ups-12 reps
Floor Dumbbell Chest Press-8 reps
Bent Over Row-12 reps
Overhead Shoulder Press-8 reps
excercise.description: Start off with your 10 min body stretch with 2 sets of 25 jumping jacks! Have a great Upper Body Work Out!

name: Treadmill Jog-15 min
Mountain Climbers-20 reps
Jump Squats- 10 reps
Jumpe Rope- 15 min
excercise.description: Do not rush your stretches! Be sure to stay hydrated! Let's get to it!

name: Hip Lifts- 20 reps
FLutter Kicks- 30 seconds
Hip Dips- 20 reps
V-Sits- 15 reps
excercise.description: Stretch your body! Work on your breathing and stay hydrated, this one is gonna BURN!

name: Squat to Shoulder Press- 12 reps
Deadlift to Bicep Curl- 12 reps
Russian Twist into a Pike- 10 reps
Cursty to Upright Row- 12 reps
excercise.description: Beach Body Loading! Be sure to drink water. Strech your body slowly for 10 min.

name: Neighborhood Walk- at least 30 minutes
excercise.description: Do not forget to stretch and Take it easy, TGIF!

name: Burpee's- 15 reps
Elevated Pushups- 12 reps
Clapping Jumping Jacks- 90 Seconds
Jump Rope- 15 minutes
excercise.description: Slow Body Strech for 10 min, Stay Hydrated! Enjoy your Weekend!
